definition: to read/to study (a subject)/to attend (a school)/to read aloud/to give (sb) a tongue-lashing (CL:頓|顿[dun4])/to miss (sb)/idea/remembrance/twenty (banker's anti-fraud numeral corresponding to 廿[nian4])
variant of 念[nian4], to read aloud
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: Business Process Execution semantics are difficult to conceptualize.
sentences.chinese: 业务过程执行语义很难概念化。

sentences.english: Conceptualisation of KLOFFE as an "Options and Futures Exchange".
sentences.chinese: 吉隆坡期货和期权交易所的概念化？

sentences.english: I wrote above that the behavior of complex systems is hard to conceptualize.
sentences.chinese: 我在上面曾写道复杂系统的行为难以概念化。

sentences.english: Conceptualise a triangle with its three points.
sentences.chinese: 可以将一个三角形的三点概念化。

sentences.english: Bid only if you have great experience conceptualizing products and package design.
sentences.chinese: 出价只有当你有很好的经验概念化的产品和包装设计。

sentences.english: Why is it so difficult to conceptualize the "sense of inexistence"?
sentences.chinese: “不存在感”的概念化为何会如此困难？

sentences.english: The difficulty involved in conceptualizing new software applications varies from project to project.
sentences.chinese: 新软件应用程序概念化的难点因项目的不同而不同。

sentences.english: There are numerous other deities who are conceptualized in many forms.
sentences.chinese: 还有许多其他神佛的人概念化的形式有多种。

sentences.english: The Dreaming And Scheming phase is the phase where you begin to conceptualize what you want to create.
sentences.chinese: 这个阶段你开始概念化你想创造的东西。

sentences.english: He said it should have an ashen, abstract quality.
sentences.chinese: 他说过正确的声音应该是苍白的，概念化的。

sentences.english: The idea conceptualized a tool for community-driven software license management.
sentences.chinese: 该思想将社区驱动的软件许可证管理进行了概念化。

sentences.english: Has anyone conceptualized an enterprise SOA model for our enterprise?
sentences.chinese: 企业中是否有人对企业SOA模型进行了概念化工作？

sentences.english: The mistake comes only in seeking an implicit sub-basement of conceptualization, or of language.
sentences.chinese: 错误只是在于寻求概念化或语言的隐含的基础。

sentences.english: Cognitive linguistics probes into the conceptualizing process of nominalization.
sentences.chinese: 认知语言学对名词化的概念化过程进行了探讨。

sentences.english: By doing so, the artist conceptualizes a burgeoning theme in contemporary Chinese art.
sentences.chinese: 借此，叶红杏将中国当代艺术的新兴主题概念化了。

sentences.english: Complex processes are essentially the hard rules to conceptualize.
sentences.chinese: 复杂流程实质上是一些难以概念化的规则。

definition: to come to the surface/to become apparent
